original_title: 中出しまでのカウントダウン。 霧島レオナ
overview: Reona Kirishima is married to a husband that gets reassigned to Tokyo and move together. There they meet with the husband’s boss Umeda, who pays a visit to the house for a dinner. Umeda mind is blown to pieces when he meets the stunning Reona. The following days he pays a surprise visit to Reona while the hubby is away.
title: Countdown to Creampie. Leona Kirishima
